channel.title: Comments on: Presuppositional Ponderings after Reading Thomas Aquinas, Whole Series

item.title: By: Scott Autry
item.dc:creator: Scott Autry
item.description: Excellent treatment. It seems that to the degree a person loosens his understanding of the noetic effects of depravity he also begins to ascribe to man capacities that are beyond man's nature.
item.content:encoded: Excellent treatment. It seems that to the degree a person loosens his understanding of the noetic effects of depravity he also begins to ascribe to man capacities that are beyond man’s nature.
